long_description:
Inputs
------
default: DataContainer
    Any DataContainer - likely connected to the output of the OPEN_SERIAL node.
short_description: The PROLOGIX_ADDR node sets the GPIB address of an instrument using the Prologix USB-to-GPIB or USB-to-Ethernet adapter.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: Response from the Prologix USB-to-GPIB controller.
